Class MaterialContext

java.lang.Object
  com.jme3.scene.plugins.blender.materials.MaterialContext

public final class MaterialContext
extends java.lang.Object

This class holds the data about the material.

Returns:
texture's projection type

getTexturesCount

getProjection

public int[] getProjection(int textureIndex)
This method returns the projection array that indicates where the current coordinate factor X, Y or Z (represented by the index in the array) will be used where (indicated by the value in the array). For example the configuration: [1,2,3] means that X - coordinate will be used as X, Y as Y and Z as Z. The configuration [2,1,0] means that Z will be used instead of X coordinate, Y will be used as Y and Z will not be used at all (0 will be in its place).

Parameters:
textureIndex - the index of the texture
Returns:
texture projection array

he material's name
